snippet: Widely praised and globally popular, Francis has raised expectations that he will bring major changes to the Roman Catholic Church.
abstract: Pope Francis approaches the first anniversary of his papacy after a year in which he has become a star on magazine covers and social media, praised for his welcoming, nonjudgmental persona; his second year will likely to prove more challenging as his success has raised expectations that he can bring major change to the Roman Catholic Church.
lead_paragraph: Widely praised and globally popular, Francis has raised expectations that he will bring major changes to the Roman Catholic Church.

headline.main: In His Second Year, Pope Faces Expectations That Change Is Coming
headline.print_headline: In His Second Year, Francis Faces Expectations That Change Is Coming

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
